tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepak is too good with his approach towards the treatment, made the procedure without any pain and got my confidence with his explanation about the treatment. I'll definitely recommend Dr.Deepak for any kind of dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Clinic were well facilitated with instant xray facility.on Tue first day appointment doctor has identified the cause of the issue I have faced long time. I am from abroad and came in a short vacation with the limited and promised time the treatment is completed.

Removing the tooth and given the temporary tooth on the next day itself to avoid embarrassment.And also Doctor Raj clearly explained about the options for permanent tooth fixtures and very patient in explaining all the doubts.

Doctor assistance call to remind the appointment that is very rare at this time.

Overall very happy with treatment and Doctor.Worth traveling from puthagaram to villivakkam thanks to practo.

Thank you doctor Raj.

Best Regards,
Suresh
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sir . Hope i have restored your smile back üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Raj was wonderful in terms of friendliness, understanding patient's issues, and giving advice. I went with issue of oral ulcer, and he patiently explained that it is due to new wisdom tooth and will require extraction. The procedure was painless and he was extremely patient despite me being a fussy patient as it was my first dentist's visit for an issue. 

Would highly recommend to visit him. It is very calming if you know the doctor taking care of you is taking efforts to understand your issue and gives you time and options. Further, he did the procedure on his off-day, that's going out of way to take care of patients.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback Ms Nandita .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: What a nice new facility! Coming into the clinic it is clean, bright, and nicely appointed. The staff is professional and greeted me right away. The wait was 5 minutes. Dr. Deepak Raj was very professional, friendly, and attentive. The equipment is clean, new, and up to date.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a very nice service and the doctor was very friendly to approach. All the process involved in the treatment were explained clearly and the service is inexpensive as compared to market standards. I would really suggest him to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i found him on practo that he had a good feedback from patients and also he is studied from saveetha college (dentist)  where i also studied (engineering) .Deepak sir is very down to earth and friendly. He clearly explained tons of doubt i had with patience. After consulting him and taking the treatment now I feel very confident about my oral health condition. Thank you Sir, will definitely recommend to my friends and family!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepak treated a cavity and replaced the crowns of two of my teeth which had undergone root canal treatment several years back. The entire procedure was painless and I was kept well informed of the procedure. Dr was very sensitive to my fears regarding pain as well as safety during this pandemic. He values patients' time which I appreciate. I am deeply thankful and would certainly recommend him to family and friends.

I was in braces treatment for a year.. What he promised on the first day the exact result came out after 1nd half year and the amazed one is I had never gone through any sufferings like pain in the entire process... Dr Deepak is completely cool to the patient's especially with juvenile nd senior citizens... He is really impeccable when it comes to dental braces  treatment

First of All I Thank Dr. Deepak Raj, for giving attentive treatment at this lock down period. He has very much friendly & took care of my dental issue and made me to smile without the pain. Thanks Dr.Deepak Raj for Ur Excellent Treatment & keep going with Ur Dental Service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for a root canal treatment. Doctor was friendly and shown good attitude towards listening and briefing about the treatment. I feared about the pain, but he said customer satisfaction is important and made confident. He treated me gradually and completed the course with more patience. The aesthetic and the environment was tidy and calm. A small area i would suggest doctor/clinic to improvise is on maintaining and respecting the patient's appointment. Thanks.
